title: Kick-off
description: Wales get the ball rolling; or more accurately spinning and flying.

title: Penalty
description: Leigh Halfpenny has a simple kick for goal 30 yards out in a central position

title: Penalty
description: The penalty is on the 22 just to the right of the posts. Halfpenny strokes the ball between the posts.

title: Penalty
description: Lopez scores...only just stays inside the left upright.

title: Penalty
description: Halfpenny takes the lead back for Wales

title: Try!
description: Roberts busts through the middle drawing a couple of tackles and passes to Lydiate who flicks an immediate reverse ball right to Biggar. Biggar races diagonally to the corner and touches down!

title: Penalty
description: Straight between the sticks. Gorgeously stroked home from a tight angle. France are in trouble now

title: Try!
description: And they get it! France finally put a few phases together and power over the line! Lopez converts.

title: Penalty
description: No mistake from Halfpenny and Wales are a converted try ahead.

title: Full-time
description: Wales keep their 6 nations hopes alive!
